catalysts.description: Phase 2a positive results in UC — first clinical evidence that miR-124 enhancement reduces intestinal inflammation
Phase 2b results: obefazimod 50mg showed statistically significant clinical remission at Week 8 in moderate-to-severe UC, with sustained response through 48 weeks maintenance
First patient dosed in ENHANCE-CD Phase 2b trial of obefazimod in moderate-to-severe Crohn's disease
Phase 2b 96-week open-label maintenance data published in JCC — continued improvement in clinical symptoms with consistent safety over 2 years
Enrollment completed for ABTECT-1 and ABTECT-2 Phase 3 induction trials: 1,275 patients across 600+ sites in 36 countries — one of largest Phase 3 UC programs ever

ABTECT Phase 3 induction results: 50mg achieved pooled 16.4% placebo-adjusted clinical remission at Week 8 (ABTECT-1: 19.3%, p<0.0001; ABTECT-2: 13.4%, p=0.0001). All key secondary endpoints met. Safety clean.
catalysts.outcome: Both trials positive — stock surged. NDA-track.

catalysts.description: Patient-reported outcomes data: 37% of 50mg patients reported no bowel urgency at Week 8 vs 18.1% placebo (p<0.0001). Significant improvements in quality of life, sleep, work productivity.
catalysts.outcome: Positive PRO data strengthen NDA package

catalysts.description: 22 abstracts accepted at ECCO 2026 including oral presentation on anti-fibrotic activity in preclinical IBD models — first evidence obefazimod may address fibrosis in Crohn's
catalysts.outcome: Anti-fibrotic signal is novel and unexpected

catalysts.description: DSMB review found no new safety signals with >80% of maintenance trial participants having completed 44-week double-blind treatment
catalysts.outcome: Clean safety through maintenance — positive signal

catalysts.description: Formation Bio licenses miR-124 activator FHND5032 from Chia Tai Feng Hai for up to $500M. Created new subsidiary Kenmare Bio. Plans to enter clinic in 2026.
ECCO 2026: Oral presentation on preclinical anti-fibrotic findings in IBD + 21 additional abstracts with expanded ABTECT data
ABTECT Phase 3 maintenance trial topline results — THE make-or-break readout. 678 patients in 44-week maintenance. If positive, NDA filing follows.
NDA submission to FDA planned (contingent on positive maintenance data)
ENHANCE-CD Phase 2b induction data in Crohn's disease expected
Phase 1 clinical trial entry planned for autoimmune diseases
Potential FDA approval for UC (if maintenance data positive and NDA filed H2 2026)
Potential Crohn's disease Phase 3 program initiation
